# TEST FIXTURE: Known vulnerable package versions
# These versions have documented CVEs and should trigger SC-02 (Vulnerability Scan)

# CVE-2021-33503 - urllib3 ReDoS vulnerability

# CVE-2022-42969 - py library ReDoS
py==1.10.0

# CVE-2021-23727 - celery command injection
celery==5.0.0

# CVE-2022-40899 - future ReDoS
future==0.18.2
